DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis: The UAS Immunotherapy protocol is efficacious and at least as efficacious as protocols described in the Allergy literature.
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy & Safety of the UAS Immunotherapy Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: Patients will be assessed for efficacy of the immunotherapy protocol by completing Consented-IRB approved clinical, medication, quality of life survey questions comparing current status while on therapy in contrast to 12 months before the inception of therapy.
DOC.criteria: Allergic rhinitis between 18 and 65 years old who have chosen to undergo immunotherapy. No beta blocker use, no pregnancy, no systemic steroids, no severe asthma/copd, no severe collagen vascular disorders, no neoplastic or uncontrolled seizure activity, no previous anaphylaxis, no significant cardiovsacular disease.
